mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT product_id FROM product WHERE product_id = #{productId});
SELECT pproduct_id, product_num, picture, title, artist_name FROM product
SELECT product_id, product_num, picture, title, artist_name FROM product WHERE artist_name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%' ) OR title LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%' )
SELECT product_id, product_num, picture, title, artist_name, description, price FROM product WHERE product_id = #{productId}
SELECT p.like_count FROM product p WHERE product_id = #{productId}
SELECT pi.type, pi.size, pi.year FROM picture_info pi WHERE pi.product_id = #{productId}
SELECT t.name FROM tag t inner join product_with_tag pwt on t.tag_id = pwt.tag_id WHERE pwt.product_id = #{productId};
SELECT product_id, picture FROM product WHERE artist_name = #{name};
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET basic_view = basic_view + 1 WHERE product_id = #{productId}
UPDATE product SET qr_view = qr_view + 1 WHERE product_id = #{productId}
UPDATE product SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE product_id = #{productId}
UPDATE product SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE product_id = #{productId}
UPDATE product SET order_count = order_count + 1 WHERE product_id = #{productId}
